messages.title: BREXIT NEGOTIATIONS ARE STARTING IN UNDER TWO WEEKS
messages.content: Just 11 days after you vote, Brexit negotiations with Britain will begin. So whoever is Prime Minister must be up to the job and ready to start. Getting those negotiations right is central to everything. Get Brexit wrong and our economy will be at risk. This means it will be harder to pay for the services on which we all rely. Everything from educating our children to looking after our elderly, controlling immigration and keeping our country safe, depends on getting Brexit right.

messages.title: EITHER THERESA MAY OR JEREMY CORBYN WILL BE REPRESENTING BRITAIN IN BRUSSELS – IT’S YOUR CHOICE
messages.content: Our Prime Minister will need to walk into that room to represent Britain, stand up for Britain, and fight Britain’s corner. Theresa May or Jeremy Corbyn. There are no other options. It’s nonsense for the local Labour Party to say that a vote for the Labour candidate in Birmingham Northfield doesn’t matter nationally. Richard Burden is Jeremy Corbyn’s candidate. Every vote for him is a vote for Jeremy Corbyn.

messages.title: IT COULD COME DOWN TO JUST SIX SEATS. OURS IN BIRMINGHAM NORTHFIELD COULD BE ONE OF THEM, SO YOUR VOTE REALLY MATTERS
messages.content: It takes a loss of just 6 seats and Theresa May’s government loses its majority. This would create the chaos of a government led by Jeremy Corbyn. An unstable coalition of the SNP, Lib Dems and others – putting our Brexit negotiations at risk.

messages.title: BACK ME AND THERESA MAY WITH YOUR VOTE ON 8TH JUNE AND WE WILL BUILD A COUNTRY THAT WORKS FOR EVERYONE
messages.content: I’m standing with Theresa May because she has a plan for Brexit and the ability to deliver. This will mean we can make the investment needed for schools and hospitals every year as well as helping businesses create even more well-paid jobs.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Negotiate Brexit in a way that protects the economy and public services.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It could come down to just six seats... putting our Brexit negotiations at risk.

issues.economy: Get Brexit wrong and our economy will be at risk. Create well-paid jobs.

leaflet.personalStatement: I do hope you can give me your vote. Best wishes, Meg
